scripts.type-coverage: npm run type-coverage:client && npm run type-coverage:server
scripts.type-coverage:client: if not exist coverage-ts\client mkdir coverage-ts\client && typescript-coverage-report --project client/tsconfig.json --threshold 100 --cache --ignore-unread --outputDir coverage-ts/client/ --ignore-files client/.next/**/*
scripts.type-coverage:server: if not exist coverage-ts\server mkdir coverage-ts\server && typescript-coverage-report --project server/tsconfig.json --threshold 100 --cache --ignore-unread --outputDir coverage-ts/server/ --ignore-files dist/**/*
scripts.local: npm run local --workspace=client && npm run local --workspace=server
scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace=client && npm run dev --workspace=server
scripts.release: npm run release --workspace=client && npm run release --workspace=server
scripts.prod: npm run prod --workspace=client && npm run prod --workspace=server
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=client && npm run build --workspace=server
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run deploy:dev --workspace=client && npm run deploy:dev --workspace=server
scripts.deploy:release: npm run deploy:release --workspace=client && npm run deploy:release --workspace=server
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy:prod --workspace=client && npm run deploy:prod --workspace=server
